name: 譚巽言
objective: 1.AMS chart與序向邏輯設計方法實習，2.以SSI/MSI Chip設計邏輯實習，3.Timing Generator 實習，4.HardwiredController實習，5.專題製作。
schedule:
1.MSP430F5xx Generation Architecture & Overview
2.MSP430F5xx In-Application
3.Understanding the new '5xx Integrated Power Management Module (PMM)
4.Using the Flexible æ5xx Universal Clock System (UCS)
5.RF Networking with the MSP430 & eZ-RF2500 - Part I
6.RF Networking with the MSP430 & eZ-RF2500 - Part II
7.Digital filtering methodoliges for MSP430 systems
8.Implementing an MSP430 Accelerometer- Based Data Acquisition
